gotomi.info

Hi, I'm Tomasz

I am a front-end engineer, currently working as a web performance team leader at Allegro. If you want to contact me, you can easily find me on Twitter, GitHub or Linkedin.

My photos

From time to time I create music using DAW, MIDI software instruments, MIDI keyboard and occasionally also my voice. I will probably never consider any of my tracks finished, but you can enjoy the latest drafts if you like.
